Education.experience: College life experience is truly one of a kind.The most common memories people have of college life are definitely goofing around with friends.They remember how the group of friends walked around thecollege in style and playing silly pranks on each other < /br>
The education was mainly over IIT-Jee syllabus.I tried my best to secure an Nit but I failed.I secured a 13k rank in AP-Eamcet.Time passed too fast still I feel i just completed my highschool </br>
I graduated highschool, where I enjoyed doing science, math and arts. I realized that I had passion for Technology . Then I started to spend time learning stuff about it. </br>
